scripts.start:docker-no-scheduler: docker-compose -f docker-compose-no-scheduler.yaml down && DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker-compose -f docker-compose-no-scheduler.yaml up --build --remove-orphans -d --wait
scripts.start: npm run init && npm run start:docker && concurrently "npm run start:services" "sleep 5 && npm run migrate"
scripts.start:no-scheduler: npm run init && npm run start:docker-no-scheduler && concurrently "npm run start:services" "sleep 5 && npm run migrate"
scripts.reset-docker: docker-compose down && docker system prune -a -f && docker builder prune -f && docker image prune -f
